import React, {useEffect, useState } from 'react' import axios from 'axios' export default function Billing() { const[ProductId,setProductId]=useState(0) const [User,setUser]=useState({ name:"pradeep", address:"ertyuioihgfc", list:[{ id:0, name:"fggvb", count:1, price:10 }, ], totalAmount:10 }) const onchageUser=(event)=>{ const{name,value}=event.target setUser(prev=>({...prev,[name]:value})) } const onchageProductId=(event)=>{ setProductId(event.target.value) } const Handlesadd=(id)=>{ axios.get(`http://localhost:3000/product/${id}`) .then() } return (


{User.name}

{User.address}

{ User.list.map(x=>( )) }
ProductName ProductPrice ProductCount
{x.name} {x.price} {x.count}

{User.totalAmount}

) }
